survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Autonomous Grocery Shopping Carts Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on their experience with autonomous grocery shopping carts to improve service quality and user satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you use autonomous grocery shopping carts?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to measure frequency of use. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you use autonomous grocery shopping carts?

questions.question_text: What features of the autonomous grocery shopping cart do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Rarely' or more frequently in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to identify key features. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.

script.question_text: What features of the autonomous grocery shopping cart do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Rarely' or more frequently in Q1

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using autonomous grocery shopping carts?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended format to gather detailed feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for comprehensive responses.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using autonomous grocery shopping carts?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of the autonomous grocery shopping cart?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Rarely' or more frequently in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of the autonomous grocery shopping cart?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend autonomous grocery shopping carts to others?
